title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: AR-Based Biomechanical Knee Load Analysis Practical Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational biomechanics theory, kinematic analysis knowledge, and basic understanding of AR technology
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can quantify knee load changes when performing volleyball movements (drop landing, spike jump, etc.) in an AR simulation environment
Learners can diagnose biomechanical risk factors by analyzing patellar tendon force and knee moment data

Learners can collect and analyze three biomechanical data points (joint angles, muscle activation, gait cycles) in an AR-recreated soccer stadium environment and write a report evaluating clinical applicability using a 5-point rubric (accuracy, practicality, innovativeness).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
